body: again reading the cartoon, who is the scream while do the sex¿ no understandings

But i guess mindbroken blonde foreigner lolis wearing leather boots two sizes bigger than their feet that bear remarkable resemblance to cagliostro being raped by a opium nigger looking like he belongs in a chinese 3-kingdoms war manga could be exempt from my list of taboos... for research

And I'm Chinese, even though yes there is indeed lolicons in China (influenced by Japanese anime), but there is no rape doujin or any doujin really, since the making and distribution of porn is illegal.( can't  really stop us from watching JAV or doujin though)
You idiots can't even tell apart Japanese from Chinese? If you can't tell apart Japanse kanji from Chinese characters then fine, but how could you possibly not see the Japanese flag or tag?
What is up with these chinese authors and innocent loli rape? It makes random foreigners think rape-doujins are very common in China or something.
